duties_responsibilities.duty: Market and sell insurance products through retail stores and phone, focusing on cross-selling and customer retention.
Develop and maintain customer relationships within community organizations and local business community.
Assist in marketing activities and office operations under the guidance of an Agent or Lead Sales Agent.
Monitor competitors in the local market and make suggestions to improve the company's position.
Responsible for sales administration, reporting activities, and attaining business goals through product marketing and servicing.

education_certification.credential: Property/Casualty license preferred but not required
